ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who have iman in the Signs of their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who believe in their Lord's revelations,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: who have full faith in the Signs of their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who believe in the revelations of their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those who believe in the signs of their Lord –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those who believe in the Ayat of their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And those who believe in the communications of their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and those who believe in the signs of their Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And those who believe in the revelations of their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And those who in the signs of their Lord do believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and believe in the signs of their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who believe in the Signs of their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those who believe in the Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.) of their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who believe in the verses of their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And those who believe in their Lord’s Verses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they who believe in the signs of their Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:58] and who believe in, [who] accept the truth of, the signs of their Lord — the Qur’ān;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And those who believe in the revelations of their Lord) in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an, for these We hasten with good things;
